description: A schema describing a particular JSON format
title: Schema

type.title: Type (type)

desc_enum.object: Nested mapping of key/value pairs (a.k.a. 'properties').  You may also have a 'properties' property which is itself a sequence containing a single schema definition
desc_enum.array: Nested sequence of items ('array' in many languages).  You must also have a 'sequence' property which is itself a sequence containing a single schema definition

type.description: The datatype of the property (e.g. number, boolean, etc), used for determining the semantics of the variable described

title.description: A user-friendly title for the property
title.title: Title (title)

id.description: An identifier used to reference this property using the 'idref' property
id.title: Identifier (id)

description.description: A description for use in documentation and context help
description.title: Description (desc)

$ref.description: Reference to a schema segment with the given 'id' property.
$ref.title: Identifier reference (idref)

enum.description: Enumerated sequence of valid values for this property.
enum.title: Enumeration (enum)

additionalProperties.description: A mapping containing a description for each possible value listed in the enumeration (enum) property.  Used for documentation and context help.
additionalProperties.title: Description for enum value

optional.description: If 'true', then this property doesn't need to be present
optional.title: Optional property? (optional)

properties.description: A mapping containing schema segments describing each property in the mapping.  The 'type' property must be set to 'object' to use this property.
properties.title: Properties (properties)

items.description: A list containing the subschemas for validating list items.  Currently limited to just one.
items.title: Items (items)
